mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_IDX, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_WRITER, NOTICE_COMMENT, NOTICE_INSERT_DATE FROM notice_board WHERE NOTICE_DELETE_AT = 'N'

SELECT AAA.* FROM( SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice_board B WHERE B.NOTICE_DELETE_AT = 'N' ) AS TOTAL_COUNT, AA.* FROM( SELECT ABS(@ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1) AS NOTICE_COUNT, NOTICE_IDX, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_WRITER, NOTICE_COMMENT, NOTICE_INSERT_DATE, NOTICE_CLICK_COUNT FROM notice_board , (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) ROWNUM WHERE NOTICE_DELETE_AT = 'N' ) AA ) AAA limit #{START}, #{END};
SELECT NOTICE_IDX, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_WRITER, NOTICE_COMMENT, NOTICE_INSERT_DATE, NOTICE_CLICK_COUNT FROM notice_board WHERE NOTICE_DELETE_AT = 'N' AND NOTICE_IDX = #{notice_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_board ( NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_WRITER, NOTICE_WRITER_IDX, NOTICE_COMMENT, NOTICE_DELETE_AT, NOTICE_INSERT_DATE ) VALUES ( #{notice_title}, #{notice_writer}, #{writer_idx}, #{notice_comment}, 'N', date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') )
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_board SET NOTICE_TITLE = #{notice_title}, NOTICE_COMMENT = #{notice_comment}, NOTICE_UPDATE_DATE = date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') WHERE NOTICE_IDX = #{notice_idx}
UPDATE notice_board SET NOTICE_DELETE_AT = 'Y' WHERE NOTICE_IDX = #{notice_idx}
UPDATE notice_board SET NOTICE_CLICK_COUNT = NOTICE_CLICK_COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_IDX = #{notice_idx}
